text: Hu Yingzhen (; born December 9, 1984 in Taipei), also known by the stage name Xiao Zhen () and the English name Karen Hu, is a Taiwanese actress, model, and host. Her father, Hu Gua, is also a famous host in Taiwan. She is known for her roles in Lucky Days, Boysitter, and The Fierce Wife. ==Personal life== She attended high school in Switzerland for four years. In 2007, she married plastic surgeon Li Jinliang. However, after multiple extramarital affairs, she filed divorce papers in 2013. They have a daughter. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class = "wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! English Title !
